description: A clone of the Trello webapp built in AngularJS
title: Trello Clone

tech.presentation: SASS, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, Angular UI

text:
Recreates Trello's popular drag and drop feature to reorder both lists and individual cards.

Express/Node server connected to SQL database enables collaboration amongst teams and individuals.

Supports keyword searching as well as label based filtering.

description: A E-commerce site for local artist I contributed to in a team of several devlopers.
title: Wildlife Artistry

tech.presentation: SASS, CSS, HTML, Foundation, Foundation for Emails

text:
My primary contributions include:
-Adapting several Foundation templates for use in the product-details and cart views.
-Building server side architecture including RESTful API endpoints.
-Writing PostgreSQL queries taking advantage of aggregate functions to improve performance.
-Creating automated order confirmation email system to send responsively styled custom emails.

description: A clone of the Y-Cominator's forum section (Hacker News) built in AngularJs
title: Hacker News Clone
text:
A serverless clone of Hacker News' brutalist design.

Pulls data from third-party API and leverages recursive Angular directives to recreate fully collapsable nested tree comment structure.
